docs.lead_paragraph: What worries you most? Decaying teeth, thinning bones, heart disease, stroke, diabetes, dementia, cancer, obesity? Whatever tops your list, you may be surprised to know that all of these health problems are linked to the beverages you drink -- or don't drink. Last year, with the support of the Unilever Health Institute in the Netherlands (Unilever owns Lipton Tea), a panel of experts on nutrition and health published a ''Beverage Guidance System'' in hopes of getting people to stop drinking their calories when those calories contribute little or nothing to their health and may actually detract from it.

headline.main: You Are Also What You Drink

docs.abstract: Jane E Brody Personal Health column discusses nutritional qualities of various beverages and health risks associated with consuming them; drawing (M)
